content:
Hello FMG,
I have a PSS that I believe needs approval from FMG. The project is called FHIR Shorthand, and is being sponsored by FHIR Infrastructure, and has already been approved by them. Here's the link: https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIRI/FHIR+Shorthand+-+PSS
I would be happy to appear on a conference call, or whatever you need next.
Mark
We'll try to take it up on today's call @Mark Kramer
